text: Ai tu jolma hasudungan ni rohana i do dibasabasahon Debata hapistaran, parbinotoan dohot las ni roha; alai anggo tu halak pardosa dilehon do hangaluton laho papungupunguhon dohot pagukgukkon, asa lehonon ni Debata muse tu jolma hasudungan ni rohana i. Nang i ndang marguna hape, jala pangeahion di alogo sambing do i.
